original_text: For there must be also heresies among you, that they which are approved may be made manifest among you.
korean_text: 너희 중에 파당이 있어야 너희 중에 옳다 인정함을 받은 자들이 나타나게 되리라

sentences.original_text: For there must be also heresies among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 이단이 반드시 있어야 하니

sentences.original_text: may be made manifest among you
